mapper.insert: insert into article_modify_record (article_id, article_last_modify_date, article_title, article_author, article_summary, article_label, article_read_total, article_create_date, article_category_id, artilce_place_top, article_top_priority, article_attach_file, article_html_content, article_md_content, article_attach_url ) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleLastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleReadTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artilcePlaceTop,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleTopPriority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleAttachFile,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleHtmlContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{articleMdContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{articleAttachUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select article_id, article_last_modify_date, article_title, article_author, article_summary, article_label, article_read_total, article_create_date, article_category_id, artilce_place_top, article_top_priority, article_attach_file, article_html_content, article_md_content, article_attach_url from article_modify_record where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and article_last_modify_date = #{articleLastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
